entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump BREAKING NEWS: Trump claims his Good Friday show sees the highest ratings in TV history. Trump goes on to state that he has never felt better with such high ratings and that with these incredible ratings the COVID-19 epidemic will be defeated strongly.
